SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreGrids] ( [CoreGrids_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreEntities_Ky] int NULL , [CoreGrids_Custom] bit NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [CoreGrids_Default] bit NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [CoreGrids_Title] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreGrids_Order] int NULL , [CoreGrids_SQLFrom] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreGrids_SQLWhere] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreGrids_SQLOrder] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreGrids_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreGrids_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreGrids_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreGrids_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreGrids_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreGrids_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [CoreGrids_Rows] smallint NULL DEFAULT ((30)), [CoreForms_Ky] int NULL , [CoreGrids_Code] varchar(200) NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreGrids] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreGrids PRIMARY KEY ([CoreGrids_Ky])
